comment: Claude Code MCP Configuration Examples for Apple Docs V2
comment2: Choose ONE of these configurations based on your setup

local_development.description: For local development - connects directly to local MCP server

remote_deployment.description: For remote deployment at 192.168.2.5 - uses STDIO bridge

usage_instructions.step1: Choose either local_development or remote_deployment based on your needs
usage_instructions.step2: Copy the 'config_for_claude_code' content to your Claude Code config file
usage_instructions.step3: For remote deployment, replace YOUR_MCP_API_KEY_HERE with your actual API key
usage_instructions.step4: Ensure the remote server has ENABLE_HTTP_WRAPPER=true in its .env file
